last_episode_to_air.name: The Long Haul
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Perfect Matches are tested on how much they've learned about each other in a race to escape from Melbourne. The house comes to terms with their relationships while Devin's manipulations takes a toll on Rashida.

name: Are You The One: Second Chances
original_name: Are You The One: Second Chances
overview: 10 Perfect Match from all 5 seasons of Are You The One come together for a second chance to win love and money by competing in missions designed to test the strength of their relationship.

episodes.name: Second Chances
episodes.overview: 10 Perfect Match from all 5 seasons of Are You The One come together for a second chance to win love and money by competing in missions designed to test the strength of their relationship.

episodes.name: Wound Up In The V
episodes.overview: Ellie snaps when Nate's interest in pretty women distracts him from the game. Gio gets upset when Alicia spends time with her match. Tori finds herself at odds with Devin.

episodes.name: Wolf of Match Street
episodes.overview: Perfect Matches try to overcome old baggage in their quest for success. Gio's dark side puts a strain on his relationship with Francesca and the house. Tori confronts her past with Morgan.

episodes.name: The Gift Of Love
episodes.overview: The house manipulates Carolina and Hayden's rocky relationship while Asaf tries to take his relationship with Kaylen to the next level. Things get wild during a game of strip flip cup.

episodes.name: End of the Line
episodes.overview: Tori worries that her relationship with Morgan is in jeopardy; a secret about Rashida is spilled; Mike sets out to prove his affection for Alicia.

episodes.name: Blind Choice
episodes.overview: Putting the matches on the spot by forcing them to show PDA; Tori thinks that Morgan may be turning against her; the house gets a surprise.

episodes.name: Drive Me Crazy
episodes.overview: Mike tries to manipulate the other perfect matches; Cam makes a big mistake that could destroy his relationship with Mikala.

episodes.name: This or That
episodes.overview: Shanley and Adam ride an emotional rollercoaster. Devin reveals a devious plan. One Perfect Match grows closer together while another drifts apart.

episodes.name: Over the Edge
episodes.overview: Cam and Mikala's relationship hangs in the balance. Tori and Morgan re-take their relationship to the next level. Temperatures flair when a Mission literally sends the Perfect Matches over the edge

episodes.name: The Long Haul
episodes.overview: The Perfect Matches are tested on how much they've learned about each other in a race to escape from Melbourne. The house comes to terms with their relationships while Devin's manipulations takes a toll on Rashida.
